name: KGF
Story: Over the course of several years, two convicts form a friendship, seeking consolation and, eventually, redemption through basic compassion.

name: RRR
Story: In German-occupied Poland during World War II, industrialist Oskar Schindler gradually becomes concerned for his Jewish workforce after witnessing their persecution by the Nazis.

name: KGF
Story: The life of boxer Jake LaMotta, whose violence and temper that led him to the top in the ring destroyed his life outside of it.

name: KGF
Story: cynical expatriate American cafe owner struggles to decide whether or not to help his former lover and her fugitive husband escape the Nazis in French Morocco.

name: KGF
Story: Following the death of publishing tycoon Charles Foster Kane, reporters scramble to uncover the meaning of his final utterance: 'Rosebud.'

name: KGF

name: KGF
Story: The story of a terminally ill man who wishes to live life to the fullest before the inevitable occurs, as told by his best friend.

name: KGF
Story: A tragic incident forces Anirudh, a middle-aged man, to take a trip down memory lane and reminisce his college days along with his friends, who were labelled as losers.
